dashboard-no-profile.title: Getting Started with Your Workplace Passport

sections.heading: Welcome to Workwise
sections.text: Your Digital Workplace Passport helps you document and share your workplace needs with your line manager, promoting a more inclusive work environment.

screenshot.caption: Select your profile to get started

sections.heading: Getting Started
sections.text: To begin using your workplace passport:
callouts: Select your profile from the dropdown menu
The dashboard is organized into three sections: Actions, Categories, and Resources
Click on any category tile to start adding your responses
Use the email button in the header to share your responses with your line manager
Access help anytime by clicking the 'i' button in the footer

sections.heading: Dashboard Overview
sections.text: Your dashboard is organized into three main sections: Actions (personal plans), Categories (workplace topics), and Resources (support materials). Each section contains tiles that allow you to navigate to specific areas.

screenshot.alt: Dashboard with three sections showing Actions, Categories, and Resources
screenshot.caption: Dashboard showing Actions, Categories, and Resources sections

sections.heading: Using the Dashboard
sections.text: Here's how to navigate your workplace passport:
callouts: Actions section: View and manage your personal action items
Categories section: Click category tiles to explore questions and add responses
Resources section: Access helpful workplace support materials
Use the email button in the header to share your public responses
Click the 'i' button in the footer to access help anytime
Adjust text size using the font control in the footer

sections.heading: What's Next?
sections.text: Start by exploring categories that are most relevant to your role and workplace needs. You can always come back to add more responses later.

sections.heading: About Actions
sections.text: Actions are personal plans you create to help address workplace challenges. Each action is linked to a question from your workplace passport.

screenshot.alt: Actions list showing action items with status toggles and link icons
screenshot.caption: Your personal actions list with Active/Inactive toggles

sections.heading: Managing Actions
callouts: Toggle between Active and Inactive status for each action
Click the link icon to view the related question
Use 'Show inactive' toggle to see archived actions
Set actions as public/private to control sharing

sections.heading: Sharing
sections.text: Public actions are included in emails to your line manager, helping them understand your proactive approach to workplace challenges.

sections.heading: About Resources
sections.text: Resources are helpful materials, links, and information related to workplace support and neurodivergent needs.

screenshot.alt: Resources page showing available support materials with clickable links
screenshot.caption: Browse available workplace support resources

sections.heading: What You'll Find Here
callouts: Learn about workplace accommodations
Find support materials for specific challenges
Access external links and tools (click the URL to open in a new tab)
Discover best practices for workplace inclusion
Get guidance on communicating your needs

sections.heading: About Categories
sections.text: Categories group related workplace topics and questions. Each question helps you document your workplace needs and preferences.

screenshot.alt: Category view showing available questions with status indicators
screenshot.caption: Questions within a category - checkmark shows answered, question mark shows needs attention

sections.heading: Question Status
callouts: Question mark (?) - Questions that need your attention
Checkmark (âœ“) - Questions already answered or skipped
Click any question to add or edit your response
Set response visibility (public/private) for each answer

sections.heading: About Responses
sections.text: Your responses document your workplace needs, preferences, and experiences. You have full control over what you share.

screenshot.alt: Response editing interface showing privacy controls and action buttons
screenshot.caption: Edit responses and control their visibility

sections.heading: Your Options
callouts: Provide a detailed response explaining your needs or preferences
Mark the question as 'Not Applicable' if it doesn't apply to you
Skip the question to answer it later
Edit or update your response anytime
Delete your response if you no longer want it saved
Toggle between public and private visibility

sections.heading: Privacy Control
callouts: Public - Can be shared with your line manager via email
Private - Remains confidential to you only
Change the setting anytime using the toggle

sections.heading: Creating Actions
sections.text: Once you've answered this question, you can create personal action items:
callouts: Actions help you address workplace challenges proactively
Click 'Add Action' to create a plan linked to this question
Edit or delete actions anytime
Set actions as Active/Inactive to manage priorities
Control action visibility (public/private)
Public actions appear in emails to your line manager

sections.heading: What You're Seeing
sections.text: This preview shows a summary of your public responses and actions formatted as an email for your line manager.

screenshot.alt: Email preview showing formatted workplace passport summary with send button
screenshot.caption: Preview your workplace passport before sharing

sections.heading: Before Sending
callouts: Check that all information accurately represents your needs
Verify only public responses and actions are included
Use the notes field at the bottom for additional context (sparingly - the app tracks everything through questions, responses, and actions)
Remember you control when and what to share

sections.heading: Sending
sections.text: When you're ready, enter your line manager's email address and click send. The email will be sent with a professional summary of your workplace passport.
